name: Tour de France Legstrong
description:
RUN GAME IN FULLSCREEN!

To play the game use LEFT and RIGHT to accelerate the bicycle and UP and DOWN to "turn". Press the LEFT MOUSE button to throw some waterbottles against zombies. You really need to work on alternating LEFT and RIGHT to get a good speed.
This game can be played as CO-OP where one makes use of LEFT and RIGHT while the other uses UP (W) and DOWN (S) and the mouse.

Tour de France Legstrong was developed during the 41st Ludum Dare, where the theme was to combine 2 incompatible genres.

The game was developed during in a 72h time span from 2018-04-21.

Tour de France Legstrong is a mix between a sports simulator and an apocalyptic survival game.

The game was developed using Unity Game Engine 2017.

By Ananki As

Doccers
Gennon
Freebo

Credits
Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music
